Package CAB302.Backend

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
CAB302.Backend.Cell
public class Cell extends Object
The information of a cell inside the maze

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Cell(int xComp, int yComp)
    Creates an unexplored cell in a given (x, y) position with all walls

  • Method Details

    • findValidNeighbour

      public Cell findValidNeighbour(Cell[][] cells)
      Selects a random unexplored neighbour
      Parameters:
      cells - A 2D array that is the entire maze
      Returns:
      a random unexplored neighbour, returns null if none are found

    • isValid

      public Cell isValid(Cell[][] cells, int xComp, int yComp)
      Checks if cell is in bound and returns it
      Parameters:
      cells - A 2D array that is the entire maze
      xComp - The x position of the cell
      yComp - The y position of the cells
      Returns:
      the cell if it is in bound, returns null if out of bounds

    • removeWalls

      public void removeWalls(Cell neighbour)
      Removes the walls in between two cells
      Parameters:
      neighbour - The neighbouring cell that shares the wall to be removed

    • removeWall

      public void removeWall(int index)
      Removes a specific wall in the cell
      Parameters:
      index - Specifies a wall | 0 - top | 1 - right | 2 - bottom | 3 - left |
